data.name: April
description: Meet April, our inspirational yoga teacher who has a karma score of 5. She specializes in working with people with disabilities, creating accessible and empowering classes for all.
With her compassionate and gentle approach, April encourages students to connect with their bodies and breath, cultivating mindfulness and inner peace.
April's classes are designed to meet the unique needs of each individual student.

data.name: Sara
description: Meet Sara, our popular yoga teacher and YouTuber! Her fun and entertaining classes have earned her a loyal following of yoga enthusiasts from all over the world.

Sara's upbeat personality and engaging teaching style make her classes a joy to attend. She loves to combine traditional and modern yoga practices to create a unique and enjoyable experience for her students. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced yogi, Sara's classes are accessible and fun for all levels.

data.name: Jack
description: Meet Jack, our professional yoga teacher who studied in India and has worked in 7 countries. With a deep understanding and appreciation for yoga, Jack's classes are a blend of traditional and modern practices designed to meet the needs of each individual student.
Jack's extensive experience and knowledge make him a sought-after teacher. Jack is committed to helping his students deepen their practice, build strength and flexibility, and achieve their goals.
